table_data: Cost-per-click decreased from 2021 to 2022 driven by a number of interrelated factors, including an increase in search queries resulting from growth in user adoption and usage, primarily on mobile devices; pricing changes; and device mix, geographic mix, product mix, and advertiser spending, ongoing product changes, and property mix, as well as the unfavorable effect of foreign currency exchange rates.
description: Google Ads paid clicks and cost-per-click change analysis, 2021, 2022.
